<ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken>2062</ppi:PPIBusinessEntityIdentifierToken> </ws:token> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <ws:paymentId>-1</ws:paymentId> <ppi:PaymentSegment> <ppip:Amount>10.50</ppip:Amount> <ppip:SegmentType>Payment Amount</ppip:SegmentType> </ppi:PaymentSegment> <ppi:PaymentType>Regular</ppi:PaymentType> <ppi:ProcessDate>2019-07-26T08:59:00.000-04:00</ppi:ProcessDate> </ppi:AdditionalInfo> <ppi:Customer> <ppi:AddressLine1>2311 york road</ppi:AddressLine1> <ppi:Country>US</ppi:Country> road</ppi:AddressLine1> <ppi:PhoneNumber>7038944043</ppi:PhoneNumber> <ppi:FirstName>imt</ppi:FirstName> <ppi:LastName>ahm</ppi:LastName> <ppi:EmailAddress>iahmed@govolution.com</ppi:EmailAddress> <ppi:ZipCode>22201</ppi:ZipCode> <ppi:IsBusinessName/> </ppi:Payor> <ppi:Vehicle> <ppip:AbaNumber>256072691</ppip:AbaNumber> <ppip:AccountType>Savings</ppip:AccountType>
